posts.description:
"They went with songs to the battle, they were young..."
.
.
.
#ANZACDay #anzacday2017 #calligraphy #australia

A letter from a commanding officer to the mother of an ANZAC soldier. I don't think the grieving family would have thought there was much to congratulate them on, but I suppose life was different in 1916.
.
It seemed like a good piece to practice my fledgling Spencerian on - since I'm already up too late to have any chance of making it to the dawn service! #ANZACday2017
.
.
.
#anzacday #lestweforget #calligraphy #australia #spencerianbaby #dawnservice #justsayno #publicholidaysareforsleeping

Do you think it's overkill to literally buy a printing press just to have the business card you always wanted? 😂😂😂
.
Okay, there were other reasons! Having a letterpress means I can do small scale prints of nearly anything, so it'll be very useful for my work. But mostly I just wanted business cards on handmade paper. 😍
.
Paper: @peterkinpaper 
Press: Adana 8x5
Calligraphy by me, obviously 😅
Mistakes and uneven weight: also by me! Turns out there's a learning curve! 😂😂
.
#letterpress #lovemyjob #calligraphyau #calligraphynerd #calligraphylife #melbourne #melbourneweddings #businesscards #indiehandmade #satisfying #handmade #homepressed #learning #artistlife #instaart #instagood #clagraphyosm

Silly calligraphy playtime, with the sound of the beach in my ears - what a great way to spend a long weekend!
.
.
.
#maluabay #calligraphy #calligraphynerd #calligraphylife #longweekend #beachsidecalligraphy #familyholidays

Things We Have Learned Today:
• watercolour ink doesn't mix with sealing wax
• watercolour ink spits when it boils
• don't try this at home 😂😂😂
• just mix different wax colours instead
• it's prettier anyway.
.
I don't know if I talked about this M before! Like the square one, this is also a @heypenman design and you can buy it at @blackmarketintl. Which I did! None of these posts are sponsored. I don't think anyone would pay anyone to talk about stupid decisions with ink and wax 😂😂 I just do this stuff to give my hands a break from calligraphy.
.
.
.
#waxseal #waxstamp #mixingcolors #osmer #gold #pen #sealingwax #calligraphy #satisfying #rainydays #lovemyjob

An informal variation of copperplate on some tasty watercolour. I just really love ocean shades lately! 💙💚💙🖤💚

And here's the whole piece - just a little one. I'm liking flowing lines and bright colours a lot at the moment. 😂😍😋💖❤️💛💚
.
.

#handmadepaper #calligraphy #copperplate @peterkinpaper #bookshelves #mariongarretty #quote #love #lovethattexture #deckle #melbourne #melbourneart

Here's a closeup of some work on @peterkin Indie Handmade. It's tricky to work on with a super fine nib but it's really satisfying when it works. Hot tip (ok, lukewarm tip): give it a good coating of workable fixative first, to help the fibres lie together, and then do the calligraphy. You still get a bit of ink skip and a bit of fibre drag, but I think that's part of the effect of the paper. Handmade paper, handwritten text - if you're looking for machined perfection, don't look here 😂😂
.
.
.
#calligraphynerd #calligraphylife #calligraphy #copperplate #handmade #handmadepaper #lovethattexture #melbourne #melbourneart
